description: Foliera offers a complete range of potted plants and decorative containers for all seasons that make living spaces come alive. For over 30 years, our product quality and customer service has set us apart.

name: 10" Hibiscus Standard Assorted (NO RED)
description: The Hibiscus is a gorgeous tropical plant with big beautiful trumpet-shaped flowers.  The maintencance on this plant is reletively easy.  It like lots of sun but can handle the shade.

name: 8.25-inch Dracaena Marginata
description: Dracaena Marginata, also known as dragon tree, is an attractive, stiff-leaved plant with green sword-like leaves edged with red. Aside from the ornamental benefits, it will purify air, provide humidity control and sharpen focus.

name: 6 in. Pot Assorted colors Calandiva (Kalanchoe) Indoor Plant 1-pack
description: Foliera offers a complete range of potted plants and decorative containers for all seasons that make living spaces come alive. For over 30 years, our product quality and customer service has set us apart.

name: 2 Gallon (7.5L) Dropmore Scarlet Honeysuckle Vine
description: Lonicera X b. 'Dropmore Scarlet' # 2 gal. Mature size 4-6m x 1m Climbing plant blooming from June to August with scarlet red flowers in trumpet shape. Tolerates drought. Rapid growth.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Karl Foerster Feather Reed Grass (Calamagrostis)
description: Cool season grass, with lovely pinkish plumes that move in the slightest breeze. Sterile seed means this clumping grass stays in one place!  This grass holds its form maintaining its tidy appearance throughout the season.  Hold off sheering till spring for some winter interest above the snow.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Dreameria Sweet Dreams False Sea Thrift (Armeria) Flowering Plant
description: A beautiful breakthrough in Armeria breeding! Loads of large pink globe-shaped flowers bloom from spring to fall. Very heat tolerant and can handle dry spells, too. Easy to grow and maintain. Adaptable and tough for thriving in a multitude of conditions and climates. Trim old flowers once a month to encourage more blooms.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Pink Panther Coral Bells (Heuchera) Flowering Plant
description: Pink Panther is an excellent choice for mass plantings, rock gardens, border edgings or ground cover. This evergreen produces vivid pink foliage that will age to a dark purple-pink with dark grey veins. You can expect to see rose pink flowers on tall, dark stems in midsummer, giving this plant striking garden contrast. This is an excellent option for attracting butterflies to your yard. Pink Panther is relatively low maintenance but does require pruning in the late fall to prepare for winter. This selection performs well in both full sun and full shade and prefers moist soil. When fully mature this plant will grow to 12 inches tall.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Jack Frost Siberian Bugloss (Brunnera) Flowering Plant
description: Jack Frost is grown for its beautiful heart-shaped silver leaves that are veined with mint green and are topped with clouds of small sky blue flowers that are similar to forget-me-nots. Awarded as the 2012 Perennial Plant of the Year, this tidy, mounding plant is easy to care for, making it perfect for beds and borders, banks and slopes, or underplanting of roses and shrubs. It will slowly spread to create a thick ground cover. This plant will perform best in medium moisture, well-draining soil and in part shade. Try growing them in a container so they can be close at hand when you want a few snips for a spring bouquet.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Delphinium x hybrid Red Lark 2g Shrub
description: Elevate your garden effortlessly with the Delphinium x hybrid Red Lark, a stunning perennial that seamlessly blends beauty with ease. This gem graces your landscape with vibrant coral-red blooms, becoming an irresistible focal point. Thriving in full sunlight conditions and boasting a hardiness zone of 3, the Red Lark stands as a resilient and low-maintenance choice. Adding a touch of sophistication, its elegantly cut foliage enhances the overall allure of your garden. The densely packed flowers not only captivate with their beauty but also attract pollinators, creating a vibrant and lively outdoor space. Perfect for both novice and seasoned gardeners, this hybrid Delphinium steals the spotlight in borders, beds, or containers.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Everlasting White Eye Hardy Carnation (Dianthus) Flowering Plant
description: This long-blooming, compact perennial has fragrant semi-double white blooms with soft pink centers that are displayed atop finely textured blue-green leaves.  This versitile plant is a great option for containers, rock gardens and mixed garden beds.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Balmy Purple Bee Balm (Monarda) Flowering Plant
description: Notable for their powdery mildew resistant foliage, the Balmy Bee Balms produce an abundance of vibrant flowers on a very compact plant. Considerably shorter than other varieties of monarda, this selection features dark purple flowers arranged in gorgeous shaggy heads. Grows best in moderately moist soil with 4 to 6 hours of sun each day. The average size at maturity reaches 10 to 12 inches tall, with a spread of 8 to 12 inches. A favorite of cottage gardeners everywhere, plus a bee and hummingbird magnet!

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Veronica austriaca Venice Blue 2g Flowering Speedwell Perennial
description: Veronica austriaca Venice Blue is a vibrant burst of blue for your garden. This perennial beauty showcases dense spikes of striking violet-blue flowers, creating an eye-catching display that lasts from early spring to summer. Compact and easy to care for, Venice Blue stands at a modest height, making it perfect for borders, rock gardens, or containers. Its full foliage adds a touch of lush greenery even when not in bloom, ensuring year-round appeal.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Lami Dark Purple Creeping Lamium Flowering Plant
description: This stunning silver ground cover produces dark purple blooms supported by silver-white leaves edged in green. It is a perfect accent plant as it loves to spread or gently trailideal for rock gardens, in mass plantings or in containers. Creeping Lamium is very easy to care for and is tolerant of dry shade, will grow in most soils and is drought tolerant when established. Once established, trim back in late winter to promote new growth in the spring. Deer and rabbits will typically ignore this selection as they will opt for tastier snacks. When fully mature, Lami Dark Purple will grow to 4-8 inches tall and 1-2 feet wide.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Pink Kahori Hardy Carnation (Dianthus) Flowering Plant
description: Kahori means fragrance in Japanese, and these bright, fluorescent lilac-pink flowers have a pleasing spicy aroma.  Blooms are displayed thoughout the summer on top of grey-green mounding foliage.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Leucanthemum x superbum Sweet Daisy Izabel 2g Shasta Daisy Flowering Perennial
description: A garden gem that promises to brighten your landscape. Leucanthemum x superbum Sweet Daisy Izabel daisy-like blooms adds a touch of timeless charm to any garden. This compact and well-behaved shasta daisy stands at an ideal height, making it perfect for borders, flower beds, or containers. Thriving in full sun to partial shade, Sweet Daisy Izabel is adaptable to various soil types, ensuring easy integration into your garden. Its low-maintenance nature makes it an excellent choice for both novice and experienced gardeners.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Hosta x Wide Brim 2g Perennial
description: Hosta x Wide Brim is a lush and versatile addition to your shade garden. Its big, heart-shaped leaves boast a vibrant green hue bordered by creamy white margins, effortlessly adding elegance and texture to any landscape. This perennial favorite thrives in shady spots, making it a superb choice to breathe life into underutilized garden areas. Wide Brim's impressive size and distinctive foliage elevate it to a standout presence, whether it's serving as a beautiful backdrop or commanding attention as a focal point in your outdoor sanctuary.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Green Ostrich Fern (Matteucia) Plant
description: A highly decorative fern with an unmistakable upright, vase shape. Light green fronds unfurl upright, and plants form beautiful clumps that spread slowly by underground stems.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Red Head Fountain Grass (Pennisetum)
description: This delightful and dramatic grass features fluffy reddish plumes above lush green foliage, which usually remain attractive well into the winter. Red Head Fountain Grass creates an excellent addition to the border that's sure to stand out. Its easy to grow, deer resistant, plus they make great fresh and dried arrangements. Grows best in full sunlight and under ideal conditions can be expected to reach 2 to 3 feet tall at maturity, with a spread of 1 to 2 feet. Particularly ideal for rock-gardens, or other drought and heat tolerant selections.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Sempervivum arachnoideum Kalinda 2g Hardy Succulent Perennial
description: Sempervivum arachnoideum Kalinda is a captivating succulent that adds a touch of unique charm to your collection. With rosettes adorned in delicate cobweb-like threads, Kalinda stands out for succulent enthusiasts. This hardy and easy-to-care-for plant thrives in well-draining soil, making it perfect for both indoor and outdoor spaces. Its compact size and eye-catching webbing make Kalinda ideal for rock gardens, containers, or as a ground cover. As the seasons change, watch Kalinda transform with stunning color variations. From bright green to rosy hues, this sempervivum offers year-round interest.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Purple Petticoats Coral Bells (Heuchera) Flowering Plant
description: Deer-resistant beauty! One of the most popular perennials for part sun to part shade locations, Heuchera, or Coral Bells, delight with their rainbow of foliage colours all season long, with tall spikes of lacy flowers mid-summer. 'Purple Petticoats' surprises with dark purple leaves on the top, but flip up the "petticoat" to reveal an even brighter purple colour underneath. It's an excellent groundcover for dry shade, and is the perfect companion to other woodland plants like astilbe and bleeding hearts.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Grace Ward Lithodora Blue Flowering Plant
description: The ultimate rock garden perennial! While slightly mounding, this sprawling groundcover will add softness and beauty to retaining walls and between rocks. Deep blue flowers smother the dark green foliage for weeks.

name: Garden Elements 2Gallon (7.5L) Anne Greenaway Creeping Lamium Flowering Plant
description: 'Anne Greenaway' is an excellent choice for a tough yet showy ground cover. One of the best ground covers for hard to manage areas. This creeping Lamium forms a spreading patch of small brightly coloured leaves with light green centres surrounded by a chartreuse border and a striking silver swish up the centre. In the summer, clusters of delicate purple flowers will appear. Deer and rabbits will typically ignore this British selection as they will opt for tastier snacks. Once 'Anne Greenaway' has been established, it is drought tolerant. It will brighten up any shady area as it only requires 3-4 hours of morning sunlight each day. This easy-to-care plant is an excellent choice for an accent plant as it loves to spread and gently trail. Try it in a mixed container! When fully mature this Lamium will grow to 6-8 inches tall and 12-24 inches wide.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Sunsparkler Cherry Tart Succulent (Sedum) Flowering Plant
description: Deep pink summer blooms are a fantastic contrast for the unique cherry-red foliage.  Bees love sedum flowers!  Easy care, and drought-tolerant once established.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Blue Angel Hosta Plant
description: Blue Angel is truly one of the best large blue hostas in the garden! Its heart shaped blue-green leaves form a very large mound making it a specimen to be admired. Keep in shade to maintain the blue colouring throughout the summer. Slug Resistant.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Avalanche Feather Reed Grass (Calamagrostis)
description: Avalanche is a beautiful variegated ornamental feather reed grass. Its narrow and elegant creamy-white striped leaves with lovely pinkish plumes that move in the slightest breeze are noted. Featuring sterile seed means that this clumping grass will stay in one place! An excellent choice for providing garden interest in the form of vertical lines and borders. This cool-season variegated foliage grass loves average soil on the medium to wet side and even does well in heavy clay. For this plant to perform at its best, it requires full to part sun. It will grow to 4-6ft tall and 1-3 ft wide. Cut back old stems to the ground in the early spring before growth resumes.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Little Vision in Pink Astilbe Flowering Plant
description: Perfect for containers or small spaces, Little Vision in Pink offers all the same great features as the original Vision in Pink but in a smaller package. This dwarf variety produces dense pink feathery blooms on dark green fern-like foliage and is an excellent choice for your border selection. This plant is perfect for attracting butterflies to your yard but is not particularly attractive to deer, who will tend to opt for tastier plants. This herbaceous perennial is a later blooming species and is useful for extending your growing season into late summer. More sun tolerant and drought-tolerance than other astilbes. This relatively low maintenance plant provides fabulous flowers for cutting, and its fern-like leaves remain dark green in colour throughout the season. Little Vision in Pink is best cleaned up in the early spring before resuming active growth for the season.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Majeste Lungwort (Pulmonaria) Flowering Plant
description: An ideal plant to celebrate the start of the gardening season. Pulmonaria Majeste are among the most dependable and showy spring-blooming perennials. Its mounding habit will spread to make a beautiful foliage display. For foilage appreciators, it is good value. Plants should be cut back after blooming to rejuvenate the leaves, which will then remain attractive all season. It loves shade and tolerates drought once established. A stellar pick for shaded gardens or pathways, beneath roses and other deciduous shrubs.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Evergold Japanese Sedge Grass (Carex)
description: Evergold is a lovely delicate texture variegated sedge grass that grows in arching clumps and doesnt spread, great for providing contrast in part shade areas. The narrow grass features creamy-yellow leaves framed with dark green edges. For this grass to perform at its best, it requires 3-4 hours of sun in the morning or late afternoon. The foliage will be richer in part shade than in the full sun. Ideal in containers or massed in the garden, it provides a great contrast in the garden. Evergreen in milder climates. It will mature to a size of 10-12 inches tall and 12-16 inches wide. Comb through the plants in the winter to remove dead foliage.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Green Tassel Fern (Polystichum) Plant
description: One of the most popular ferns to give an air of elegance to your garden. Lustrous green fronds emerge upright and then curl backwards, creating the tassel like appearance. Compact in size, and evergreen in most climates.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Golden August Moon Hosta Plant
description: August Moon Hosta bears wide, heart-shaped golden leaves with slightly rippled margins and white undersides. The leaves emerge green, slowly brightening to a golden yellow. More sun-tolerant than other hostas, morning sun with afternoon shade is ideal to achieve the brightest leaf colour.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Overdam Feather Reed Grass (Calamagrostis)
description: 'Overdam' is a beautiful white feather reed grass with variegated leaves. The foliage starts with bright cream margins, which fade to white with a pink tinge. This cool-season grass features lovely pink plumes with sand-coloured seed heads that move on the slightest breeze. It is a multi-season interest plant and provides a beautiful backdrop for low-growing, flowering perennials all year long. 'Overdam' loves average medium to wet soil and does well in heavy clay. This great looking plant is low maintenance and very versatile. For this plant to perform at its best, it requires full to part sun. It will grow to 3-4ft tall and 1-3 ft wide.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Vision in Red Astilbe Flowering Plant
description: Vision in Red Astilbe features purplish red plumes rising above a compact mound of bronze-green fern-like foliage.  The flowers make excellent additions to a floral vase, or leave the seed pods to create interest above the winter snow.  This variety is more sun tolerant than most astilbes and makes an excellent addition to any container or mixed garden.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) White Edged Francee Hosta Plant
description: Francee is a long time garden favourite. Dark green leaves are edged with crisp white margins while lavender flowers emerge above the foliage in mid-summer. More sun-tolerant than other hostas, morning sun with afternoon shade is ideal.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Black Scallop Carpet Bugle (Ajuga) Flowering Plant
description: Black Scallop Carpet Bugle is an excellent groundcover with stunning scalloped near-black foliage topped with light blue fragrant flower spikes.  Ideal in containers, or planted in front of silver or light coloured plants for an eye-catching display.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Elsie's Gold Stonecrop (Sedum) Succulent Plant
description: Elsie's Gold Stonecrop forms a bushy mound of succulent green leaves with variegated foliage that adds brightness to the garden from spring through fall. Contrasting colours paired with its compact, upright spreading habit of growth make this beauty a must have. This easy to care for plant thrives in full sun and is best cleaned up in early spring. A classic contrast plant for beds, borders, and containers.

name: 2Gallon (7.5L) Blue Zinger Sedge Grass (Carex)
description: This blue sedge grass develops exceptional silvery-blue foliage with elegant fountain-like clumps. It can form a soft groundcover if planted in locations with more moisture as it is quite vigorous. Fantastic in a container with ferns, heucheras or astibles. Blue Zinger is well known for holding its colour throughout the winter in warmer climates. For this plant to perform at its best, it requires 3-4 hours of morning sun with filtered sun throughout the rest of the day, one of the few ornamental grass types that thrive in low sun areas. Once established, this plant is drought tolerant. It will grow to 12-18 inches tall and 12-24 inches wide. This slow-spreading grass is relatively low maintenance. The narrow foliage adds a subtle texture and exciting colour to your garden.

name: 3G Triple Mix A Clematis Vine
description: A beautiful mix of three different varieties of clematis (Ramona, Dr. Ruppel, Clair de Lune) to provide you with a palette of colours and an extended bloom season.

name: 8-inch Petiolaris Vine
description: Hydrangea anomala petiolaris # 2 gal. Mature size 8m x 1.8m Climbing plant flowering in July with flat-topped cluster of white fragrant flowers. Small aerial roots along the stems allowing it to cling to objects.

name: 7.5L (2 Gal.) Virginia Creeper Vine
description: A vigorous and fast growing vine, Virginia creeper (Parthenocissus quinquefolia) is an outstanding plant for nearly any soil and light situation. Growing Virginia creeper vine provides a nearly carefree addition to the landscape. Virginia creeper maintenance is limited to light pruning and tying up.

name: 7.5L Thorndale Ivy Ground Cover Plant and Vine
description: A selected form with leaves slightly smaller, segments more pointed and attractive creamy-white veination. Fast growing and can be used as a ground cover or as a vine. If using Thorndale Ivy as a vine it does require support and a helping hand.  This plant has tons of vigour and is widely used in the garden. The lush attractive foliage is eye catching and its hardiness provides superior garden performance.

name: Mandarin Honeysuckle Shrub Vine 2g
description: Mandarin Honeysuckle is a super-hardy free flowering deciduous vine that produces abundant clusters of showy, orange trumpet-shape flowers with golden throats and bright golden-yellow reflexed petals. The flowers begin emerging in spring and continue well into fall drawing the attention of the hummingbirds.

name: 11-inch Pink Small Leaf Mandevilla Tropcial Vine on Trellis
description: A classic tropical vine, mandevilla is a great way to add a splash of color to any sunny space suitable for a hanging basket or in your garden by transplanting into a container or garden by simply removing the Trellis. With big, showy blooms that continue all summer and the fact that the plant is low-maintenance makes it a top vine choice. Mandevilla vines have seen a great resurgence in popularity. Great for containers, Deer resistant. Mandevilla is usually grown as an annual because it dies when exposed to freezing temperatures, it can be overwintered indoors.

name: 3G Triple Mix C Clematis Vine
description: A beautiful mix of three different varieties of clematis (Guernsey Cream, Anna Louise, Nelly Moser) to provide you with a palette of colours and an extended bloom season.

name: 3G Triple Mix E Clematis Vine
description: A beautiful mix of three different varieties of clematis (Rouge Cardinal, Hagley Hybrid, Jackmanii) to provide you with a palette of colours and an extended bloom season.
